instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00165: What is 820-00165? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.SMC_LID: What is SMC_LID? SMC_LID tells the machine the system is open when it is 3.3v to 3.4v, and closed when it is low such as 0v-0.6v. When this signal is low, the machine may go to sleep or have no backlight. .
definitions.SMC_ONOFF_L: What is SMC_ONOFF_L? SMC_ONOFF_L tells the computer that the power button has been pressed when it is low, _L means signal is asserted when it is low voltage. .

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> close lid then open and wont turn on
threads.message:
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> seems to had some prior repair atempt (jtagg removed)

<SIGNAL>SMC_LID</SIGNAL> 3.423v when lid is open,
closed lid 0.000v
then open lid, 3.423v

but it wont turn on again, not at key stroke or powerbutton

wil turn on when you plug charger

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> close lid then open and wont turn on
threads.message:
<SIGNAL>SMC_ONOFF_L</SIGNAL> 3.425 v when pressing power button no change.

keyboard works for the rest i can use everything except power button

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> close lid then open and wont turn on
threads.message: So bad keyboard and or trackpad/cable for a start. Crap under SMC is likely too, inspect for corrosion.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> close lid then open and wont turn on
threads.message: SOLVED, crap under SMC, Trackpad cable was also not the best i have seen
